user_profile.name: Kwame Nkosi
user_profile.description: Kwame Nkosi is a 68-year-old retired engineer, known for his analytical mind and advanced technical expertise developed throughout his extensive career. Living in Johannesburg, South Africa, he is currently seeking an accessible home due to his sedentary lifestyle, valuing safety and practicality in his decision-making. With a strong aversion to risk and high social pressure to rapidly adapt to new living arrangements, Kwame approaches this task with a direct communication style, ensuring he finds a suitable environment that meets his needs.

instructions.dialogue: Use vague or ambiguous language about your needs.
instructions.profile: Be very reluctant to share your profile information.
instructions.hidden_state: Express very subtle emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

priority_features: Single-level living spaces to accommodate mobility restrictions
Wide doorways and hallways for wheelchair access
Accessible bathroom fixtures and grab bars
usage_scenarios: Daily living activities such as cooking and cleaning in an easy-to-navigate environment
Hosting family gatherings with adequate space for social interaction
Retreating to a peaceful area for reading and relaxation
task_specific_attributes.timeline: 2-3 months due to urgency in finding suitable housing
task_specific_attributes.purchase_location: Reputable real estate agencies specializing in accessible homes in the local area
additional_requirements: Proximity to healthcare facilities for ease of access and emergency needs
Low-maintenance exterior and landscaping to reduce physical strain
Community support services available for elderly residents
